name: Platform (Rkna)
description:
Platform is a short puzzle game made in one week, for an university project. 

In the game you will have a gun that changes some properties from platforms:

- Blue (Jump) = Makes the platform a JumpPad

- Yellow (Extrude) = Extrudes the platform

- Fuchsia (Cube) = Spawns  a Cube 

With these mechanichs you will escape a laboratory that promised you freedom if you complete some puzzle chambers. 

Yes, it is basically Portal without portals  ;)
